K.G.label: Geometry—Kindergarten
bullets: Identify and describe shapes; position words (above/below/beside…).

1.G.label: Reason with shapes and their attributes

2.G.label: Reason with shapes and their attributes

3.G.label: Reason with shapes and their attributes

4.G.label: Draw and identify lines and angles; classify shapes

7.G.label: Figures/relationships; angle measure, area, SA, volume

8.G.label: Congruence & similarity via transformations; Pythagorean Theorem

G-CO.D.13.label: Construct equilateral triangle, square, regular hexagon inscribed in a circle

G-CO.C.9.label: Prove theorems about lines and angles

G-SRT.C.8.label: Use trig ratios & Pythagorean Theorem to solve right triangles
